Class ComputerPlayer

java.lang.Object
Player
ComputerPlayer
public class ComputerPlayer
extends Player
Represents a computer player. Mostly uses random logic if budget falls within a certain boundary and a decision is not forced.
Version:
May 26, 2021
Author:
rohit

  • Constructor Details

    • ComputerPlayer

      public ComputerPlayer​(java.lang.String name, Bank bank, int lowBalance, int highBalance, int minProperties)
      Create a new ComputerPlayer object.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the player
      bank - bank associated with the player
      lowBalance - minimum balance of budget
      highBalance - maximum balance of budget
      minProperties - minimum number of properties before improving owned properties
